comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:9.0a1) Gecko/20110826 Firefox/9.0a1
Build ID: 20110826030805

Steps to reproduce:

With more than 1 tab open, detach a tab


Actual results:

Original window still shows content of detached tab, with nothing selected on the Tab bar


Expected results:

The next tab (as decided currently) should be selected and its content should be shown in the window
